name: keratinous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
containing or made from keratin (= a strong natural protein, the main substance that forms hair, nails, horns, feathers, etc.): The nail is a flat, keratinous, translucent structure. All cephalopods such as octopus possess a sharp beak, made of the same keratinous material as a bird's beak.
More examplesFewer examplesKeratinous structures contain a number of water soluble organic compounds.This may be cause by an accumulation of keratinous material within the duct.These cells contain a keratinous hyaline body, and a small shrunken nucleus.
